alert.note: Alert for East Carteret; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 9:13PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Craven and central Carteret Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 912 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over North Harlowe, or near Newport, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morehead City, Newport, North River, Harlowe, Wildwood, Open Grounds Farm, North Harlowe, Bettie, Michael J Smith Airport, Oceana Pier, Rachel Carson Estuarine Reserve, Fort Macon State Park and Crab Point Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: East Carteret; Southern Craven; West Carteret
